messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: DOCUMENT REF: Z9-7523-RX DATE ISSUED: 03/05/23  Yesterday, around noon, Detec. W. X. Xavier reported an incident of assault near Central Park. The information was passed on by Mrs. Thompson of 32 Elm Street. IMMEDIATE DISPATCH TO: ASSAULT DIVISION. REQUIRED ACTION!  Chief Patrol. Y. Z. York and Officr. A. B. Bravo were at a coffee shop when they received the update. MAPLE STREET 13:15 Assault Case. Mrs. Peterson provided initial accounts, and Mr. Clark gave some camera snapshots. For deeper analysis, Technologist Carla was summoned.  EMERGENCY TRANSFER TO: ASSAULT DIVISION 7 - QUICK UPDATES [MARK] Officr. Bravo, Chief Patrol. York. TEAM LEADER Detec. Xavier. CONNECTED TO: Clark, David 45 Maple St, Midtown, New Jersey 567-990. 82540. MAPLE STREET 14:25 Assault Update.  By 13:50 PM, Officr. Bravo, guided by Chief Patrol. York, zeroed in on a suspicious individual. Lt. D. E. Echo supported the search operation. Serg. F. G. Golf and Sarge. H. I. India, with their respective teams, combed nearby alleys. By 15:30 PM, one person was detained for questioning.  PRIORITY SEND TO: ASSAULT DIVISION 7 - CURRENT SITUATION [SELECT] Officr. Bravo, Lt. Echo, Serg. Golf. IN CHARGE Detec. Xavier. ASSAULT REPORT (1) Victim Testimony (2) Bystander Accounts (3) Camera Footage (4) Suspect Profile (5) Area Maps (6) Preliminary Findings COMMANDANT J. K. Kilo C.P.D. 91.620 N45 5525 Thompson, LYDIA. NAME: LOCATION: PHONE: 654-2835 HEAD: W. Xavier CASE: Z9-9800- 758 ASSAULT: 13:15 CONFIRMATION ID 87245 - RECORDED Emily Smith DATE 04/05/23 SEND NOW TO: ASSAULT DIVISION.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detec. W. X. Xavier  
Officer Context: Detec. W. X. Xavier reported an incident of assault near Central Park.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Chief Patrol. Y. Z. York  
Officer Context: Chief Patrol. Y. Z. York and Officr. A. B. Bravo were at a coffee shop when they received the update.  
Officer Role: Chief Patrol Officer 

Officer Name: Officr. A. B. Bravo  
Officer Context: Chief Patrol. Y. Z. York and Officr. A. B. Bravo were at a coffee shop.  
Officer Role: Officer 

Officer Name: Technologist Carla  
Officer Context: For deeper analysis, Technologist Carla was summoned.  
Officer Role: Technologist 

Officer Name: Lt. D. E. Echo  
Officer Context: Lt. D. E. Echo supported the search operation.  
Officer Role: Lieutenant 

Officer Name: Serg. F. G. Golf  
Officer Context: Serg. F. G. Golf and Sarge. H. I. India, with their respective teams, combed nearby alleys.  
Officer Role: Sergeant 

Officer Name: Sarge. H. I. India  
Officer Context: Serg. F. G. Golf and Sarge. H. I. India combed nearby alleys.  
Officer Role: Sergeant
